segments.text: In this sunlit kitchen, everything seems routine at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands drying a plate with care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh no, the sink is overflowing uncontrollably!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the front, pooling at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't react, totally absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the side, a boy's climbing toward the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool under him looks ready to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies from the jar with glee.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, smiling in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being sneaky, but it's charming in a way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, the wet floor could make someone slip badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window reveals a beautiful, calm garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad how these hazards go unseen in such a homey place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the fun doesn't turn into tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mix of innocence and peril.
segments.speaker: PAR
